name: Anger Management (Efe Alaçamlı, Ömer Akyüz)
description:
Both sides are pissed off but you need to win in this argument. You can shout or be nice. it's really up to you. You can get mad and curse or wait and say something nice in order to win in this fight.

Anger Management is a 2D co-op game.  Both sides are pissed off but you need to win in this fight by controlling your anger. You can shout an argument by cursing without waiting, or you can say nice things by cooling down.

Control keys are W, S to vertical movement and D to argument for player one;  up, down arrow keys to vertical movement and left arrow key to argument for player two. You also need to keep your followers to believe you, so cover them or they'll start to block you.

Code, assets, sound and music are created by Ömer Akyüz and Efe Alaçamlı, and developed under 48 hours for İTU OTG Frostjam2018. Special thanks for Tuna Pamir and Sercan Muhlacı for their awesome ideas.
